programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez.(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: A family purchases a robot servant to perform menial tasks but quickly realises this is no ordinary droid when he begins to develop human emotions and the capacity to think for himself, a quality encouraged by his owner's children. He asks for his freedom, and spends the next 200 years struggling to come to terms with its humanity. Chris Columbus's sci-fi drama inspired by the books of Isaac Asimov, starring Robin Williams, Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz and Oliver Platt.(n)

programme.title: Bound to Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman who is kidnapped fights back and manages to escape from her captor. She later learns she was not his only victim, and that there was a dark secret behind her abduction. The discovery drives her to hatch a plan to punish him for the suffering he has caused. Thriller, starring Tina Ivlev.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: Hard-nosed New York narcotics cop Popeye Doyle pursues a drug dealer to his lair in Marseille. However, he soon lives to regret his decision when he is captured by the criminal and subjected to a cruel revenge by being forcibly addicted to heroin. John Frankenheimer's thriller sequel, starring Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Jean-Pierre Castaldi and Charles Millot.

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Five successful married men rent an apartment where they can carry out their extra-marital affairs in secret. The arrangement works well until they find the corpse of a beautiful woman handcuffed to a bed - but which of them is the killer, and how will the grisly discovery affect their friendship? Thriller, with Karl Urban, James Marsden and Wentworth Miller.

programme.title: Kidnapping Freddy Heineken
programme.desc: Five men struggling to make ends meet decide to kidnap a beer tycoon who is one of Europe's richest men. The plan is a success, and they demand the biggest ransom in history - but tensions within the group threaten their chances of escaping the law. Fact-based crime drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Jim Sturgess and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: Dark Places
programme.desc: A seven-year-old girl witnesses the murder of her mother and sisters, and testifies that her teenage brother was the killer, leading to his imprisonment. As an adult, she attends a gathering of true-crime fans, and discovers they all think her brother was innocent. She reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime, and begins to realise her memories may not be as reliable as she thought. Mystery, starring Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult, Christina Hendricks and Chloe Grace Moretz.

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth.

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Small-time crook Tony Montana emigrates from Cuba to the US, determined to become rich and powerful. Admitted into the inner circle of a Miami drug lord, he ultimately takes over his boss's empire and even his wife. However, his paranoia and cocaine addiction begin to spiral out of control, while his enemies circle, waiting for the chance to bring him down. Gangster thriller remake, with Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer and Robert Loggia.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A teenager in the 1980s idolises a band of football hooligans and is soon drawn into their ranks. As their confrontations with rival teams' supporters grow increasingly violent, he begins to realise he has made a mistake getting involved - but finds leaving the firm is not easy. Remake of Alan Clarke's 1989 drama, starring Calum MacNab and Paul Anderson.

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers.

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: Two South African police officers, one black and one white, investigate the murder of a teenage girl. The case brings to light the lingering consequences of apartheid, and forces both men to face up to their own roles in their country's brutal history. Crime drama based on Caryl Ferey's novel, with Forest Whitaker and Orlando Bloom.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Go With Me
programme.desc: A woman returns to the isolated logging community where she grew up, and is stalked by a former cop, who now heads up a criminal organisation in the area that operates above the law. She resolves to take a stand against him, seeking the aid of a retired logger and his sidekick. Thriller based on Castle Freeman Jr's novel, starring Julia Stiles, Anthony Hopkins, Alexander Ludwig and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: In a move to identify suspected hijackers, an undercover police officer infiltrates the high-octane world of illegal late-night street racing by rival gangs. He is befriended by a champion driver, but when he also forms a bond with the racer's sister, he is pitched into a conflict of loyalties. Thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah.

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: A highly paid executive loses everything after his corrupt boss's false accounting ruins the firm and leaves him to take the blame. Flat-broke and with no income or savings to maintain his lavish lifestyle, he and his wife decide the only way to support themselves is to turn to crime. Remake of the 1976 comedy, with Jim Carrey, Tea Leoni, Alec Baldwin and Richard Jenkins.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: A boxing champion's successful life is brought to an abrupt end when tragedy strikes. He turns to a trainer coaching amateur fighters in a run-down gym for help and tries to rebuild his sporting career - while also striving to regain the lost trust of his wife and daughter. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Forest Whitaker and Rachel McAdams.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A former gangster is released from jail and vows to go straight, hoping to earn enough money to escape his New York roots - but his misguided loyalty to a crooked lawyer threatens to drag him back into a life of crime. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Al Pacino, Sean Penn, Penelope Ann Miller, John Leguizamo and Viggo Mortensen.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan, David Soul and Robert Urich.(n)

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Four city friends look forward to a weekend canoeing trip in America's Deep South. However, their adventure turns into a nightmare when menacing rednecks come down from the nearby hills and subject them to a shocking assault, forcing the men to take extreme action to save their lives. John Boorman's thriller based on James Dickey's novel, with Burt Reynolds, Jon Voight, Ronny Cox, Ned Beatty and Bill McKinney.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: The Captive
programme.desc: A couple are plagued by the disappearance of their young daughter, eight years after she went missing, and a series of disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she is still alive. Thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds, Kevin Durand, Mireille Enos and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: A disgraced former cop is arrested by the FBI for illegal street racing, but his one-time colleagues offer him freedom in exchange for going on an undercover mission. Teaming up with an old racing friend and a customs official, he has to infiltrate and bring down a drug-trafficking operation. Thriller sequel, with Paul Walker reprising his role from The Fast and the Furious alongside Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes and Cole Hauser.(n)

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James.(n)

programme.title: Standoff
programme.desc: A troubled former soldier who is haunted by his past actions comes to the aid of a 12-year-old girl who has witnessed a murder. He vows to protect her from the assassin pursuing her, but is forced to use unconventional methods to keep the killer at bay when he realises his gun only has one bullet. Thriller, starring Thomas Jane and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: A cop's career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama about an FBI agent who goes undercover in the Mafia and becomes the protege of a gangster. However, the demands of his new double-life place an intolerable strain on his relationship with his family, especially as he faces the ultimate prospect of betraying his mentor. Starring Johnny Depp, Al Pacino, Michael Madsen, Anne Heche and Bruno Kirby.(n)

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Two supermarket checkout girls covering for their friends on Christmas Eve get drawn into a drugs sting and are forced to cross a dealer to save themselves. Their absent colleagues endure a disastrous night's gambling in Las Vegas, while two men forced to take part in the sting find themselves spending a festive night with a narcotics agent. Drama, starring Katie Holmes, William Fichtner and JE Freeman.(n)

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Julie James, the survivor of the original bloody events, sets off for a holiday in the Bahamas - but as soon as she arrives, her arch-enemy returns from the dead, forcing her into a desperate battle for survival. Horror sequel, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jnr, Brandy Norwood and Mekhi Phifer.

programme.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
programme.desc: Teenagers in a sleepy town find their dreams haunted by a sadistic child murderer who was burned alive by their parents. As they struggle to find a way to stop the madman, it proves increasingly difficult to stay awake and one-by-one they gradually succumb to their worst nightmare. Horror remake, starring Jackie Earle Haley, Kyle Gallner, Rooney Mara, Katie Cassidy and Thomas Dekker.

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A couple move into a new apartment, and the husband forms a close friendship with their elderly neighbours. The wife soon becomes pregnant, and starts to suspect her spouse has been seduced into a Satanic cult, who have sinister plans for her baby. Roman Polanski's horror, based on the novel by Ira Levin, and starring Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Oscar-winner Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer and Ralph Bellamy.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film.

programme.title: Pet Sematary II
programme.desc: A boy's dog is killed by his abusive father, so he and his friend bury the animal in a place believed to hold the power of resurrection. Miraculously, the dog returns to the land of the living, but with a vicious new temperament, and savages the boy's father to death. The terrified son decides to try in turn to resurrect his parent, but with horrific consequences. Horror sequel, with Edward Furlong and Anthony Edwards.

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: An electrical repairman sees a fleet of UFOs and develops an increasing fascination with mountain-shaped forms, driving his wife to despair. Meanwhile, another woman has a similar fixation after her son mysteriously vanishes, and a team of scientists investigates a series of strange events around the world. Eventually, they are all drawn to a mountain where aliens are about to make contact. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Francois Truffaut and Teri Garr.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bay's sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bay's sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Three backpackers travelling across Europe hear of a Slovakian inn where their every hedonistic desire will be met. However, they discover they have been lured into the clutches of wealthy depraved businessmen who pay for the chance to torture people to death. Horror, starring Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson and Eythor Gudjonsson.(n)

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: A boy is left disillusioned with Christmas as his dysfunctional family spend the holiday arguing. They must soon learn to work together if they are to see New Year, when a monstrous demon appears, intent on punishing them for their lack of festive spirit - and which has the power to make the house's Christmas decorations take on murderous life. Comedy horror, starring Toni Collette and Emjay Anthony.(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: An electrical repairman sees a fleet of UFOs and develops an increasing fascination with mountain-shaped forms, driving his wife to despair. Meanwhile, another woman has a similar fixation after her son mysteriously vanishes, and a team of scientists investigates a series of strange events around the world. Eventually, they are all drawn to a mountain where aliens are about to make contact. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Francois Truffaut and Teri Garr.(n)

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: A farmer's plans for the future are ruined when a pack of wild dogs attacks and kills all his livestock. However, worse is still to come - the ravenous predators are still hungry and turn their attention to human prey, leaving the farmer and his family facing a battle for survival. Horror, starring Anna Lise Phillips and Jack Campbell.(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary young woman discovers she is the Queen of the Earth, and has the power to save it from destruction. With an alien warrior at her side, she sets about protecting the planet from an evil overlord. Sci-fi adventure, starring Mila Kunis, Channing Tatum, Eddie Redmayne and Sean Bean.(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary young woman discovers she is the Queen of the Earth, and has the power to save it from destruction. With an alien warrior at her side, she sets about protecting the planet from an evil overlord. Sci-fi adventure, starring Mila Kunis, Channing Tatum, Eddie Redmayne and Sean Bean.(n)

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: A farmer's plans for the future are ruined when a pack of wild dogs attacks and kills all his livestock. However, worse is still to come - the ravenous predators are still hungry and turn their attention to human prey, leaving the farmer and his family facing a battle for survival. Horror, starring Anna Lise Phillips and Jack Campbell.(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: A teacher is driven to the brink of despair on the last day of term by his abusive and apathetic students. He finally snaps, and later that night, resorts to kidnapping one of the worst troublemakers in his class and trying to force him to learn - at gunpoint if need be. Thriller, starring Robert Hands and Evan Bendall.(n)

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A youngster growing up in a town inhabited only by boys and women makes a strange discovery in the ocean that leaves him convinced that secrets are being kept from him. When he is taken to hospital for a series of procedures, he discovers the terrible truth about his home. Sci-fi mystery, starring Max Brebant and Roxane Duran. In French.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High
programme.desc: A lawman-turned-rancher is attacked by a lynch mob and hanged for a crime he did not commit, but is rescued before he dies. He returns to his former profession to hunt the mob down, but his desire for revenge clashes with his responsibility to bring them to trial alive. Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Inger Stevens, Ed Begley, James MacArthur, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Northwest
programme.desc: A teenage burglar uses his ill-gotten gains to support his mother and younger brother. Longing for a more profitable line of work, he gets involved with a gangster, but soon he and his sibling are in over their heads as they are drawn into a world of drugs and prostitution. Crime drama, starring real-life brothers Gustav and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese. In Danish.

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: Two brothers have tended a herd of sheep together for 40 years, but never speak to each other. When a disease outbreak prompts the government to impose a cull on livestock, they put their differences aside to protect their animals - each using his own unusual methods. Drama, starring Sigurdur Sigurjonsson and Theodor Juliusson. In Icelandic.

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A computer hacker is released from prison after being convicted of committing cyber crimes. He's immediately enlisted by the FBI when they discover that one of his software codes is being used as part of a terrorist plot. Crime drama, starring Chris Hemsworth, Leehom Wang and Viola Davis.

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: A series of devastating personal traumas leave a woman feeling self-destructive and lost. After spending years behaving recklessly, she decides to turn things around by embarking on an epic, solo trek along America's 1,000-mile-long Pacific Crest Trail, which gives her the time and space to reassess her existence. Drama based on a true story, starring Reese Witherspoon and Laura Dern.

programme.title: Stations of the Cross
programme.desc: A girl from a strict Catholic family is an outsider in her secular school, and faces constant reproach from her fundamentalist mother. Under the tuition of a misguided priest, she pushes herself to extreme acts of self-sacrifice in her pursuit of spiritual redemption. Drama, starring Lea van Acken and Florian Stetter. In German, French and Latin.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across America turning people into zombies, and the government establishes measures to capture those infected and dispose of them once the process is complete. When a teenage girl is infected, her devoted father refuses to hand her over to the authorities, and vows to defend her to the bitter end. Horror, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton.

programme.title: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
programme.desc: A hard-up reformed crook agrees to pay off his debts by doing one last job for his psychotic former boss. He reunites with a motley group of one-time criminals, but unfortunately they botch the assignment and a hitman is sent to finish them off. Thriller, starring Andy Garcia, Christopher Walken, Treat Williams, Gabrielle Anwar and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Colt 45
programme.desc: Vincent, a young police firearms expert, is forced to make use of his skills as a marksman when he is ambushed by an unknown assailant. Left with a killing to cover up, Vincent turns to a fellow gun enthusiast with ties to the criminal underworld offers to help him dispose of the evidence. In exchange, he hands over a small arsenal of weapons - including a set of home-made, explosive .45 ammo, but when said guns are used in a string of deadly robberies, Vincent must turn to seasoned police commander Chavez to help correct his fatal error of judgement. French action thriller, starring Ymanol Perset, Joey Starr and Gerard Lanvin.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: A man finds himself living on the streets as his health deteriorates, leaving him with nowhere to turn. He tries to find a place in a shelter where he befriends another homeless man, who supports and advises him in an attempt to put his life back in order and reconcile with his estranged daughter. Drama, starring Richard Gere, Ben Vereen, Jena Malone and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: The Hour of the Lynx
programme.desc: A disturbed young man committed to a psychiatric ward after murdering a couple tries to kill himself while ranting about God. A scientist aiding his treatment seeks the help of a priest in uncovering the roots of his psychosis, a process complicated by the clash of their personal ideologies. Drama, starring Sofie Grabol and Soren Malling. In Danish and Swedish.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: In 1965, amidst an atmosphere of racial unrest, civil rights campaigner Dr Martin Luther King Jr plans a peaceful march across Alabama from Selma to Montgomery. His goal is to persuade President Lyndon B Johnson to change the law, allowing black people to register to vote. Fact-based drama, starring David Oyelowo, Tom Wilkinson and Carmen Ejogo.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: A hitman takes the chance to combine his latest assassination job with a trip back to his home town for a school reunion. The occasion starts to get complicated when an old flame turns up and rekindles their lost romance - while a rival killer harasses him to join an assassins' union. Black comedy drama, starring John Cusack, Minnie Driver, Dan Aykroyd, Joan Cusack and Alan Arkin.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five criminals are brought together by a police line-up, and decide to join forces to pull off one more big job. However, they discover their meeting was not a coincidence and that a mysterious crime lord has plans for them. Bryan Singer's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Kevin Spacey, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak, Stephen Baldwin, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Suzy Amis.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A hard-working family man discovers that his six-year-old son was accidentally mixed up with another baby at birth. As he considers how to resolve the situation, the devotion of his wife and the other family involved to the children they have raised makes him wonder if he has been a good father. Drama, starring Masaharu Fukuyama and Machiko Ono. In Japanese.(n)

programme.title: Cub
programme.desc: A young boy goes on a camping trip with his fellow Cub Scouts, and crosses paths with a bloodthirsty poacher. Belgian horror, starring Maurice Luijten, Evelien Bosmans and Titus De Voogdt. In Flemish, French and Dutch.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema 2017 Preview
programme.desc: Alex Zane takes a look at the biggest films coming to cinemas in 2017 and picks the 10 he's looking forward to most.(n)

programme.title: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
programme.desc: An English teacher in Spain picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon. Comedy drama set in 1966, starring Javier Camara, Natalia de Molina and Francesc Colomer.(n)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A journalist is driven to the brink of suicide by a smear campaign after he attempts to expose the CIA's alleged involvement with Contra rebels in Nicaragua and the importing of cocaine into California. Fact-based drama set during the 1990s, starring Jeremy Renner, Rosemarie DeWitt and Ray Liotta.(n)

programme.title: Bad Words
programme.desc: Jason Bateman directs and stars in this dark comedy about a 40-year-old misanthrope who enters children's spelling contests. With Kathryn Hahn, Rohan Chand and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: Couple in a Hole
programme.desc: A couple choose to live in a cave in the woods, surviving by hunting rabbits and feeding on insects. When the wife is bitten by a poisonous spider, they are forced to reconnect with the outside world and turn to a farmer for help, who takes a suspicious interest in their reasons for renouncing civilisation. Drama, starring Paul Higgins and Kate Dickie.(n)

programme.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
programme.desc: A young strait-laced couple stranded by a storm take shelter in an eerie castle, where they are enticed into the weird world of a menagerie of debauched characters - presided over by a mad sex-crazed transvestite scientist - and undergo a startling transformation as they let go of their inhibitions. Cult musical, with Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon, Barry Bostwick and the show's creator Richard O'Brien.(n)

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.(n)

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: An enigmatic gunslinger forms an uneasy alliance with a military veteran to track down a notorious outlaw - but tensions simmer as their very different motives for the hunt put them increasingly at odds. Sergio Leone's Western sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volonte, Josef Egger, Mara Krup and Klaus Kinski.(n)

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Honeytrap
programme.desc: A Brixton teenager's misguided attempts to attract the attention of a heartless wannabe rapper have terrible results. Drama, starring Jessica Sula, Lucien Laviscount and Ntonga Mwanza.(n)

programme.title: State and Main
programme.desc: A director leads his crew to a small town in Vermont to shoot a movie. However, he finds the local landmark he was going to work around no longer exists, the writer is out of inspiration, and the leading man is indulging in a scandalous affair with a local teenager. David Mamet's comedy, starring William H Macy, Alec Baldwin, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Damn the Defiant
programme.desc: The commander of a British warship fighting in the Napoleonic campaign faces bitter opposition from his right-hand man, a cruel and sadistic officer hated by the crew. In a battle of wills between the pair, the captain's second-in-command tries to provoke his leader's wrath by tormenting his son, an officer on the vessel. Drama, starring Alec Guinness, Dirk Bogarde and Anthony Quayle.

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: A drifter rides into a town dominated by the members of a ruthless family. He befriends a Mexican in jail for killing a man who attacked his sister and tries to save him from the gallows, getting caught up in the evil clan's running internal conflicts in the process. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Craig Stevens, Manuel Rojas and Barry Kelley.

programme.title: Guadalcanal Diary
programme.desc: A tough sergeant, a chaplain and two marines fight through a series of battles on the Solomon Islands during the initial skirmishes of the American forces' Pacific campaign. Second World War drama, based on the book by Richard Tregaskis, starring Preston Foster, Anthony Quinn, Lloyd Nolan, William Bendix and Richard Conte.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Underwater demolition experts embark on a mission to find a safe landing site for the US military to launch an invasion on a South Pacific island occupied by Japanese army and navy forces. But first the commander and his men must put aside their personal differences to ensure the mission is successful. Thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Gary Merrill.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: A teenager falls in love with a new girl in his school, only to discover she is a witch. As dark secrets from her family's past emerge, they discover that on her 16th birthday, she will be required to choose a side in a conflict between good and evil. Fantasy based on Kami Garcia's novel, starring Alden Ehrenreich, Alice Englert, Jeremy Irons and Emma Thompson.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: Tough cop John McClane arrives at an airport to pick up his wife, but finds himself plunged into a bloody life-or-death struggle. He must battle terrorists who have seized control of the terminal as part of a campaign to secure the release of a convicted drug baron. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Sadler, Franco Nero and William Atherton.

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: A misfit teenage girl lies about her non-existent sexual history, and soon becomes the talk of the school. While she endures the harassment of conservative classmates, she grows to love the attention and sets out to create yet more rumours - but is unprepared when things get out of hand. Teen comedy, starring Emma Stone, Penn Badgley and Amanda Bynes.

programme.title: High Hopes
programme.desc: A dispatch rider deals with the complicated problems of his family, as his elderly mother grows increasingly forgetful and is neglected by his sexually unfulfilled sister. Meanwhile, his girlfriend tries to persuade him to have children - a responsibility he cannot face. Mike Leigh's comedy drama, starring Philip Davis and Ruth Sheen.

programme.title: Crash Dive
programme.desc: On the eve of departing for a dangerous mission, a submariner falls for a schoolteacher, unaware she is the sweetheart of his commanding officer. On board, the two men eventually discover they are romantic rivals, but form a close bond as they concentrate on their duty and the task of destroying enemy U-boats. Romantic wartime drama, starring Tyrone Power, Dana Andrews, Anne Baxter, May Whitty and Harry Morgan.

programme.title: Arabian Nights
programme.desc: The story of two half-brothers - one the heroic caliph, the other an evil usurper - as they do battle for the right to rule their kingdom, and win the hand of beautiful dancer Sherazade. Adaptation of the classic adventure tales, starring Jon Hall, Maria Montez, Sabu and Leif Erickson.

programme.title: The Blue Dahlia
programme.desc: A war-weary pilot returns home from service in Europe, but his welcome is far from warm. Not only must he deal with the news of his wife's infidelities, but he also finds himself accused of her murder. However, the wife of his dead spouse's lover is on hand to help him prove his innocence. Thriller, written by Raymond Chandler and starring Alan Ladd, Veronica Lake, William Bendix and Doris Dowling.

programme.title: The Ladykillers
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind and his gang come up with a cunning scheme to steal a fortune, but their plan is threatened by the unsuspecting elderly landlady of the boarding house they are staying in. They decide to dispose of her, which proves easier said than done. Classic Ealing comedy, with Alec Guinness, Peter Sellers, Herbert Lom, Katie Johnson, Cecil Parker, Danny Green and Jack Warner.

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: A wealthy New York clothes designer thinks she has a perfect marriage, so is shocked to learn her husband is having an affair. Her close-knit gossipy friends are soon on hand to offer their advice, but they all have problems of their own to contend with. Comedy drama remake with an all-female cast, starring Meg Ryan, Annette Bening, Eva Mendes and Bette Midler.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Biopic of mathematician Alan Turing, whose work during the Second World War translated seemingly unbreakable Nazi codes as well as pioneering the development of computer technology. In the years following the war, his life would be destroyed as his homosexuality was discovered, leaving him facing criminal charges. Starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley and Charles Dance.

programme.title: Underworld: Awakening
programme.desc: Vampire warrior Selene returns to life after spending years in cryonic suspension by a scientist. Escaping from the facility where she is being held, she finds humans have discovered the existence of the undead and are planning to wipe them out, a new breed of mutant werewolves has emerged, and her super-powered daughter holds the key to ending the conflict. Action fantasy, with Kate Beckinsale, India Eisley and Stephen Rea.

programme.title: The Dance of Reality
programme.desc: Premiere. Alejandro Jodorowsky's autobiographical drama charting his unhappy early life under the tough tutelage of his bullying, macho, Stalin-worshipping father Jaime, who attempted to assassinate Chile's right-wing president Carlos Ibanez del Campo. Starring Brontis Jodorowsky and Jeremias Herskovits. In Spanish.(n)

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: The leaders of the tiny European duchy of Grand Fenwick decide to solve their bankruptcy problem by declaring war on the USA. They confidently expect to lose and thereby qualify for economic aid - but the plan takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the Americans surrender. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers in three roles, with Jean Seberg, William Hartnell, David Kossoff and Leo McKern.(n)

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: Historical biopic about the life and loves of the ill-fated monarch, whose opposition to her cousin Elizabeth I led to her downfall and execution. Starring Vanessa Redgrave, Glenda Jackson, Timothy Dalton, Patrick McGoohan, Nigel Davenport and Ian Holm.(n)

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: A homesteader and his son fall foul of a crooked gambler, who makes off with the farmer's horse and rifle and leaves behind his abandoned girlfriend. However, the three of them are forced to flee by river on a raft when their farm comes under attack. Western, starring Robert Mitchum, Marilyn Monroe and Rory Calhoun.(n)

programme.title: The Black Shield of Falworth
programme.desc: The son of a disgraced medieval nobleman is raised in poverty. With the support of a kindly earl, he gains the chance to train as a knight and reclaim his birthright, proving his worth by fighting to foil a plot to overthrow the king. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Tony Curtis, Janet Leigh, David Farrar and Barbara Rush.(n)

programme.title: The Two Faces of January
programme.desc: A conman masquerades as a tour guide in Greece, and selects a wealthy American tourist and his younger wife as likely targets. However, when a murder is committed at the couple's hotel, all three are incriminated, and a dangerous alliance develops. Thriller based on Patricia Highsmith's novel, starring Viggo Mortensen, Kirsten Dunst and Oscar Isaac.(n)

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: A New York stockbroker rises from unemployment to become one of the richest men in the city's financial elite through an illegal scheme to defraud investors. His wealth brings him an outrageously debauched lifestyle, but comes at a price as the FBI become suspicious of his manipulation of the markets. Martin Scorsese's fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill and Matthew McConaughey.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia surprises her family by announcing she is going to earn extra money as a door-to-door saleswoman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The Walton clan takes an eight-year-old orphan into the home for a taste of family life.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: An outspoken local man is accused of knocking Andy Garvey unconscious and burning the family's barn to the ground - but not everyone is sure of his guilt.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles rushes Mary to an eye specialist, elated to discover she can tell light from dark, but Adam is less enthusiastic about her exciting revelation.

programme.title: Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111
programme.desc: A woman whose teenage daughter was lost in a plane crash in Nova Scotia hopes to find evidence that she somehow survived. A fisherman who was involved in the rescue effort retrieved the missing girl's sweater from the wreckage, and the desperate mother visits him in the hope that he can help find her. Drama, with Kate Nelligan, Hugh Thompson, Stacy Smith and Janet Kidder.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen goes on a date, but faces a troublesome dilemma between making a good impression and telling the truth.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and her horse Bunny are favoured to win the upcoming race in Walnut Grove - however, Mrs Oleson believes the victory should go to Nellie. To guarantee her success she purchases a thoroughbred and provides the trophy.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama based on Louisa May Alcott's novel about four sisters growing up together in New England during the American Civil War. Starring Meredith Baxter, Susan Dey and Eve Plumb.

programme.title: For the Love of a Child
programme.desc: Two inspirational women who carry out extensive work with abused, neglected and abandoned children around the world. Drama, starring Peri Gilpin, Teri Polo and Maria Del Mar.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Rumblings of discontent over the sale of a new-born calf prompt the family to join forces in a determined effort to get it back. Drama, starring Richard Thomas.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles hears about a well-paid but dangerous job as he and the Walnut Grove men make a 100 mile-long walk in search of work after the wheat crop is ravaged by a hailstorm.

programme.title: Ring of Fire
programme.desc: The story of the decades-long love affair between June Carter and her husband, Johnny Cash. Romantic drama, starring Jewel Kilcher, Matt Ross and John Doe.

programme.title: Diana: Her True Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. Biopic of Diana, Princess of Wales, based on Andrew Morton's biography, starring Serena Scott Thomas and David Threlfall.

programme.title: Ambush in Waco
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the life of American religious leader David Koresh, whose belief in his own divinity eventually led to a violent and tragic confrontation with the authorities. Starring Timothy Daly and Dan Lauria.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: An audacious killer taunts the members of Glasgow CID by bumping off the owner of the hotel where their annual dinner is being held - while proceedings are in full swing and the place is full of off-duty detectives. Drama, starring James MacPherson and Blythe Duff.

programme.title: Who Will Love My Children
programme.desc: A woman is diagnosed with terminal cancer shortly after the birth of her 10th child, and realising she has far too many children for her husband to look after on his own, decides to spend her remaining years finding suitable families to adopt them. Fact-based drama, starring Ann-Margret, Frederic Forrest, Cathryn Damon and Donald Moffat.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An eerie atmosphere descends over the household as Olivia recalls the strange events that followed the death of a childhood friend.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy returns his new high-school graduation suit so the family can afford to buy a new cow when Chance dies. Richard Thomas and Ralph Waite star.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles discovers that he has become a target for the affections of a lonely woman and her two children.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Anthrax strikes Walnut Grove, so Charles and Mr Garvey visit Springfield to pick up medical supplies. On the way back, a man holds them up and steals their wagon.

programme.title: Love Comes Softly
programme.desc: A widow enters into a temporary marriage of convenience, a practical arrangement to help a recently bereaved father care for his young daughter. However, when the time comes for her to leave, she realises circumstances and people have changed. Romantic drama set in 19th-century America, starring Katherine Heigl, Dale Midkiff, and Skye McCole Bartusiak.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy defends a freshman football player whom he previously accused of cheating, and Ben discovers the dangers of smoking.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: While collecting insects for a school project, Laura and Mary become annoyed at Carrie as she lets the bugs escape, but worry when the youngster wanders off and goes missing.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Part two of two. Drama based on Louisa May Alcott's novel about four sisters growing up together in New England during the American Civil War. Starring Meredith Baxter, Susan Dey and Eve Plumb.

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After finding himself unable to shoot a turkey while on a hunting trip, John-Boy displays his courage by saving his father's life.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: While in Mankato, Charles encounters a drunken Mr Edwards in the midst of a bar fight and brings him to Walnut Grove. To rehabilitate him, he gets him a job at Hansen's Mill, and Caroline tries to set him up with widow Grace Snider.

programme.title: Liz & Dick
programme.desc: Fact-based drama telling the story of the relationship between Hollywood icons Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton. The stars meet on the set of historical epic Cleopatra while both married to other people, and begin a passionate and very public affair. Over the next 25 years, they would marry and divorce each other twice, constantly under the scrutiny of the media. Starring Lindsay Lohan, Grant Bowler and Theresa Russell.

programme.title: Diana: Her True Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. Biopic of Diana, Princess of Wales, based on Andrew Morton's biography, starring Serena Scott Thomas and David Threlfall.

programme.title: Shadow of a Doubt
programme.desc: A washed-up alcoholic former lawyer is persuaded to return to the courtroom by an ex-lover, whose daughter is charged with murder. He agrees to take on the case, but finds himself at the centre of the media circus as the prosecution uses his drink problem to undermine his credibility. Courtroom drama, starring Brian Dennehy, Bonnie Bedelia and Fairuza Balk.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: The team is assigned to protect murderer Susan Kellar, whose recent release from jail has provoked a storm of protest and forced her to go into hiding for her own safety. Unfortunately, they find themselves unable to protect her family from the lethal attentions of a vigilante. Feature-length crime drama, starring James Macpherson.

programme.title: Someone Else's Child
programme.desc: Fact-based drama charting the tragic consequences of a maternity unit mix-up. A woman is distressed to discover she is not the biological mother of the seven-year-old she has brought up. She sets out to win custody of her real son, with traumatic consequences. Starring Lisa Hartman, Bruce Davison and Louise Fletcher.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A travelling salesman convinces the family to part with their hard-earned cash and buy a small library's worth of novels, essays and poems. But when the books fail to arrive, they soon begin to wonder if he is really a conman.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy agrees to work for a local man in exchange for a car, but ends up being taken for a ride when the scoundrel reneges on the deal.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Terminally ill Dylan Whittaker's greatest wish is to see the ocean, and he seeks Albert's help in fulfilling his dream before he dies.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Laura Ingalls attempts to prove her feelings for Almanzo Wilder are real, but faces competition from love rival Nellie Oleson. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Love's Unfolding Dream
programme.desc: A woman in 19th-century America aspires to be a doctor and her dreams seem to come true when she nurses a wealthy socialite who offers to pay for her to enrol at medical school. However, an unexpected encounter with a handsome lawyer forces her to reconsider what she really wants. Period drama, starring Scout Taylor-Compton, Nancy Linehan Charles and Patrick Levis.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The arrival of a sophisticated family from New York has unenviable consequences for the Waltons.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary and Laura hear a loud argument the night before Halloween, and become convinced they have witnessed the murder of Mrs Oleson. Drama, starring Melissa Sue Anderson and Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Prairie: The True Story of Laura Ingalls Wilder
programme.desc: Biopic of the author of The Little House on the Prairie, following her life in 19th-century Dakota. She endures various disasters and tragedies - but surves with the loving support of her family. Starring Tess Harper, Lindsay Crouse, Richard Thomas and Meredith Monroe.(n)

programme.title: Who Will Love My Children
programme.desc: A woman is diagnosed with terminal cancer shortly after the birth of her 10th child, and realising she has far too many children for her husband to look after on his own, decides to spend her remaining years finding suitable families to adopt them. Fact-based drama, starring Ann-Margret, Frederic Forrest, Cathryn Damon and Donald Moffat.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Budding author John-Boy secretly borrows a typewriter to further his career, but sister Mary Ellen causes him no end of trouble by selling it to the local junk collector. Starring Richard Thomas and Judy Norton.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Jealousy rears its head when Laura falls in love with a boy who is more interested in Mary.(n)

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: A former Cornish military captain, now a member of Parliament, is drawn into the war with France while his son falls in with smugglers. Historical drama, based on Winston Graham's novels, starring John Bowe and Mel Martin, and featuring a young Ioan Gruffudd in one of his earliest roles.(n)

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud.(n)

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: The murder of a woman thrown from a bridge appears motiveless until the team is led to a microchip factory where her husband works. Drama, starring James MacPherson.(n)

programme.title: God Bless the Child
programme.desc: Poverty and hardship force a single mother and her seven-year-old daughter to move into a shelter for the homeless. Drama, starring Mare Winningham, Grace Johnston and Dorian Harewood.(n)

programme.title: Oklahoma City: A Survivor's Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the April 1995 terrorist bombing in Oklahoma City, chronicling the tense attempts to rescue a woman trapped in the wreckage, and her subsequent day in court to give testimony on the outrage. Kathy Baker, Ray Baker, John Hawkes and Eric Johnson star.

programme.desc: Olivia surprises her family by announcing she is going to earn extra money as a door-to-door saleswoman.

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Rambo

Julie Benz, Paul Schulze and Ken Howard costar in this long-awaited follow-up

programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Hilarious "Saturday Night Live" spin-off starring Tim Meadows as Leon Phelps, a swinging throwback to the '70s enjoying his life as a Don Juan of the airwaves, dispensing naughty sex advice via his radio show. When he's fired for his politically incorrect ways, Leon seeks out an anonymous former lover who's offered to be his sugar mama, while he tries to dodge a mob of angry husbands whose wives have enjoyed intimate relations with the "ladies man." Karyn Parsons, Will Ferrell, Billy Dee Williams, Julianne Moore and John Witherspoon costar

programme.title: Veronika Decides to Die

programme.title: Good Kill

programme.title: Play It Forward

programme.title: Unknown Caller
programme.desc: Racing against time, a man must help his family escape their home that has been turned into a time bomb by a phone caller who demands they play his game(n)

programme.title: Nothing to Lose

Stars Tim Robbins and Martin Lawrence(n)

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Zbiór praktycznych porad dotyczących życia. Twórcy radzą m.in., jak przygotować coś dobrego do jedzenia lub zrobić ciekawy prezent bądź przydatny gadżet z rozmaitych przedmiotów codziennego użytku

programme.title: Sekretne smaki Paryża Rachel Khoo
programme.desc: Widzowie poznają różne dania kuchni francuskiej. Autorka poradników kulinarnych, właścicielka najmniejszej restauracji w Paryżu i prezenterka, Rachel Khoo, przedstawia ciekawe przepisy na potrawy typowe dla kraju nad Loarą. Wykorzystuje swoją wiedzę, jaką zdobyła podczas nauki we francuskiej szkole dla kucharzy, Le Cordon Bleu. Rachel przyrządza tradycyjne dania, a także eksperymentuje, łącząc odmienne smaki i tradycje kulinarne. Odwiedza również mało znane zakątki francuskiej stolicy, w których można kupić rzadko spotykane artykuły spożywcze

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie znawczynie mody Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine przybliżają Norweżkom zasady dobrego stylu i pokazują im, jak dobrze wyglądać. Odmieniają zaniedbane mieszkanki tego kraju w damy

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Grayson martwi się, że klient, którego reprezentuje w sądzie, dopuścił się zbrodni. Tymczasem Jane walczy o prawa studenta, który zmienił płeć, do korzystania na uczelni z męskiej toalety

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Grayson trafia do szpitala z raną postrzałową. Jane w pojedynkę angażuje się w kampanię przeciwko zakładowi przemysłowemu. Szkodliwe dymy i substancje wywołują wśród wielu osób liczne dolegliwości

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiadają na miejscu kierowcy. Instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para ma trzy dni na poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem(r)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Prezentacja prawdziwych, najczęściej wykonywanych w Polsce, zabiegów chirurgicznych. Tu nie ma miejsca na scenariusz. Przez kilka miesięcy kamera towarzyszy lekarzom oraz pacjentom jednego z największych szpitali publicznych. Rejestruje chwile od momentu diagnozy poprzez przygotowania do operacji, sam zabieg aż do efektu leczenia. W programie nie zabraknie także autentycznych emocji: obawy, cierpienia, ulgi czy radości. Widzowie poznają metody diagnozowania nowotworów jamy brzusznej. Piotr cierpi na chroniczne bóle brzucha. Badania wykazały, że ma guza trzustki i konieczne jest sprawdzenie, czy to zmiana nowotworowa

programme.desc: Grayson trafia do szpitala z raną postrzałową. Jane w pojedynkę angażuje się w kampanię przeciwko zakładowi przemysłowemu. Szkodliwe dymy i substancje wywołują wśród wielu osób liczne dolegliwości

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Jane reprezentuje klientkę, która zaangażowała się w prywatne śledztwo. Nie spocznie, póki nie odnajdzie kierowcy, który będąc pod wpływem alkoholu, spowodował wypadek ze skutkiem śmiertelnym

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Bogusław, właściciel firmy produkującej ogrodzenia, uskarża się na kołatanie serca. Ataki pojawiają się coraz częściej, dlatego mężczyzna postanawia skorzystać z porady lekarskiej. Badania wykazują, że Bogusław cierpi na arytmię serca. Nieleczona, może powodować udar mózgu lub nawet zgon. Lekarze postanawiają przeprowadzić ablację, polegającą na wprowadzeniu elektrody do mięśnia sercowego przez żyłę bądź tętnicę udową. Urządzenie pozwala na zlikwidowanie miejsc, które wywołują zaburzenia rytmu serca
